verses.verse: <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> an <S%G652>apostle<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> to those who <S%G3927>reside<s%> as <S%G3927>aliens,<s%> <S%G1290>scattered<s%> <S%G1290>throughout<s%> <S%G4195>Pontus,<s%> <S%G1053>Galatia,<s%> <S%G2587>Cappadocia,<s%> <S%G773>Asia,<s%> and <S%G978>Bithynia,<s%> who are <S%G1588>chosen<s%>

<S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4268>foreknowledge<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> by the <S%G38>sanctifying<s%> <S%G38>work<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> that you may <S%G5218>obey<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> and be <S%G4473>sprinkled<s%> with His <S%G129>blood:<s%> May <S%G5485>grace<s%> and <S%G1515>peace<s%> be <S%G4771>yours<s%> in <S%G4129>fullest<s%> <S%G4129>measure.<s%>

<S%G2128>Blessed<s%> be the <S%G2316>God<s%> and <S%G3962>Father<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> who <S%G2596>according<s%> to His <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G1656>mercy<s%> has caused us to be <S%G313>born<s%> <S%G313>again<s%> to a <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead,<s%>

to [obtain] an <S%G2817>inheritance<s%> [which is] <S%G862>imperishable<s%> and <S%G283>undefiled<s%> and will not <S%G263>fade<s%> <S%G263>away,<s%> <S%G5083>reserved<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven<s%> for you,

who are <S%G5432>protected<s%> by the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> for a <S%G4991>salvation<s%> <S%G2092>ready<s%> to be <S%G601>revealed<s%> in the <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G2540>time.<s%>

In <S%G3739>this<s%> you <S%G21>greatly<s%> <S%G21>rejoice,<s%> even though <S%G737>now<s%> for a <S%G3641>little<s%> <S%G3641>while,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G7506>necessary,<s%> you have been <S%G3076>distressed<s%> by <S%G4164>various<s%> <S%G3986>trials,<s%>

that the <S%G1383>proof<s%> of your <S%G4102>faith,<s%> [being] <S%G4186>more<s%> <S%G4186>precious<s%> than <S%G5553>gold<s%> which is <S%G622>perishable,<s%> <S%G1161>even<s%> <S%G1161>though<s%> <S%G1381>tested<s%> by <S%G4442>fire,<s%> may be <S%G2147>found<s%> to <S%G1519>result<s%> in <S%G1868>praise<s%> and <S%G1391>glory<s%> and <S%G5092>honor<s%> at the <S%G602>revelation<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ;<s%>

and though you have not <S%G3708>seen<s%> Him, you <S%G25>love<s%> Him, and though you do not <S%G3708>see<s%> Him <S%G737>now,<s%> but <S%G4100>believe<s%> in Him, you <S%G21>greatly<s%> <S%G21>rejoice<s%> with <S%G5479>joy<s%> <S%G412>inexpressible<s%> and <S%G1392>full<s%> of <S%G1392>glory,<s%>
<S%G2865>obtaining<s%> as the <S%G5056>outcome<s%> of your <S%G4102>faith<s%> the <S%G4991>salvation<s%> of your <S%G5590>souls.<s%>

As to <S%G3739>this<s%> <S%G4991>salvation,<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> who <S%G4395>prophesied<s%> of the <S%G5485>grace<s%> that [would come] to you <S%G1567>made<s%> <S%G1830><s%> <S%G1567>careful<s%> <S%G1830><s%> <S%G1567>search<s%> and <S%G1830>inquiry,<s%>

<S%G2045>seeking<s%> to <S%G2045>know<s%> <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G5101>person<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1722>within<s%> them was <S%G1213>indicating<s%> as He <S%G4303>predicted<s%> the <S%G3804>sufferings<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> and the <S%G1391>glories<s%> to <S%G3326>follow.<s%> <S%G3778><s%>

It was <S%G601>revealed<s%> to them that they were not <S%G1247>serving<s%> <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> but you, in <S%G846>these<s%> <S%G846>things<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> have been <S%G312>announced<s%> to you <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2097>preached<s%> the <S%G2097>gospel<s%> to you by the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven<s%> â€“ things into <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G1937>long<s%> to <S%G3879>look.<s%>

<S%G1352>Therefore,<s%> <S%G328>gird<s%> your <S%G1271>minds<s%> for action, <S%G3525>keep<s%> <S%G3525>sober<s%> [in spirit,] <S%G1679>fix<s%> your <S%G1679>hope<s%> <S%G5049>completely<s%> on the <S%G5485>grace<s%> to be <S%G5342>brought<s%> to you at the <S%G602>revelation<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
As <S%G5218>obedient<s%> <S%G5043>children,<s%> do not be <S%G4964>conformed<s%> to the <S%G4387>former<s%> <S%G1939>lusts<s%> [which were yours] in your <S%G52>ignorance,<s%>
but <S%G2596>like<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G40>One<s%> who <S%G2564>called<s%> you, be <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G846>yourselves<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> [your] <S%G391>behavior;<s%>
<S%G1360>because<s%> it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> "You shall be <S%G40>holy,<s%> for I am <S%G40>holy.<s%>"

And <S%G1487>if<s%> you <S%G1941>address<s%> as <S%G3962>Father<s%> the One who <S%G678>impartially<s%> <S%G2919>judges<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G1538>each<s%> man's <S%G2041>work,<s%> <S%G390>conduct<s%> yourselves in <S%G5401>fear<s%> during the <S%G5550>time<s%> of your <S%G3940>stay<s%> [upon earth];

<S%G3609>knowing<s%> that you were not <S%G3084>redeemed<s%> with <S%G5349>perishable<s%> <S%G5349>things<s%> like <S%G694>silver<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5553>gold<s%> from your <S%G3152>futile<s%> <S%G391>way<s%> of <S%G391>life<s%> <S%G3970>inherited<s%> from your <S%G3970>forefathers,<s%>
but with <S%G5093>precious<s%> <S%G129>blood,<s%> as of a <S%G286>lamb<s%> <S%G299>unblemished<s%> and <S%G784>spotless,<s%> [the blood] of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

For He was <S%G4267>foreknown<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> the <S%G2602>foundation<s%> of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> but has <S%G5319>appeared<s%> in <S%G3588>these<s%> <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G5550>times<s%> for the <S%G1223>sake<s%> of you

who <S%G1223>through<s%> Him are <S%G4103>believers<s%> in <S%G2316>God,<s%> who <S%G1453>raised<s%> Him from the <S%G3498>dead<s%> and <S%G1325>gave<s%> Him <S%G1391>glory,<s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> that your <S%G4102>faith<s%> and <S%G1680>hope<s%> are in <S%G2316>God.<s%>

Since you have in <S%G5218>obedience<s%> to the <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G48>purified<s%> your <S%G5590>souls<s%> for a <S%G505>sincere<s%> <S%G5360>love<s%> of the <S%G5360>brethren,<s%> <S%G1619>fervently<s%> <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another<s%> from the <S%G2588>heart,<s%>

for you have been <S%G313>born<s%> <S%G313>again<s%> not of <S%G4701>seed<s%> <S%G5349>which<s%> is <S%G5349>perishable<s%> but <S%G862>imperishable,<s%> [that is,] <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G2198>living<s%> and <S%G3306>abiding<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For, <S%G3956>"All<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> is <S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G5528>grass,<s%> And <S%G3956>all<s%> its <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> the <S%G438>flower<s%> of <S%G5528>grass.<s%> The <S%G5528>grass<s%> <S%G3583>withers,<s%> And the <S%G438>flower<s%> <S%G1601>falls<s%> <S%G1601>off,<s%>
But the <S%G4487>word<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3306>abides<s%> <S%G165>forever.<s%>" And <S%G3778>this<s%> is the <S%G4487>word<s%> which was <S%G2097>preached<s%> to you.
